title: Tag Recognition
body: When a Tag comes into range of another Tag, they synchronize and add to their contact lists. Tags will alert users if they are closer than allowed through both audible and visual cues.

title: Data Upload Cycle
body: When a Tag gets within the range of a gateway it uploads the contact list to the safercontact application dashboard stored on a dedicated and secure cloud environment.

title: Dynamic Anonmyized Tracing
body: Dynamic anonymized Tag-to-Tag communication protects the identity of your employees while keeping them safe. The visual contact tracing map allows for effective exposure risk evaluations by authorized users.
